attributes.additional_details: So many reports of MP's or PM's fighting their corner for their own personal gains or interests. Consistent lies and votes of no confidence due to party poliics. Lets eradicate the lies, hidden agendas, and uncover the politicians who seem to jump ship when the time suits, blocking national interests. By questioning, we the public will vote on an outcome that is split in government. Such as the brexit vote, or the more recent dispute between May and MP's. Audience demographic scholars & workers
attributes.background:
Similar structure to when the Brexit discussions were held. 
When the PM and MP's cannot agree on an outcome, the people put both parties on the stand infront of a live streamed/televised audience. The people vote on the outcome through live questioning, call/txt ins. Eradicate MP hidden agendas.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because televised debates would be the responsibility of the political parties and broadcasters and not the UK Government or Parliament.
